title: Store Glitched

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

body:
I been playing League for some time and I've never seen discount in Blue Essence or in Influence Points. Only in Rp(Riot Point) 
Is my store glitched or is it a Riot Bug?

replies.body: Wait... did I end up in the NA forum or what?
Nah dawg, this is LAS, Choripanes, Kitchneristas, Weas and Alpacas everywhere!
Un norteamericano que se llama juan{{sticker:sg-lulu}}

Just a visual bug, the discounts are only for RP, not for blue essence.

Btw, this is LAS server.

EDIT: Whoops, it seems like there are some discounts on a few champs on the shop for blue essence You can see the list [here.](https://boards.las.leagueoflegends.com/es/c/charlas-generales/7Y68nEHB-info-acampeones-a-mitad-de-precio-en-ea-y-devoluciones) Yes, those are the prices on the champs ^-^
